investigation.step1Question: What does this step look like?
investigation.step1Description: Prior to coming to our firm, we understand that many of our clients want to know exactly what the investigation process looks like. To understand how we determine whether or not your matter will become a lawsuit, please read below.
investigation.step2Question: What does this process consist of?
investigation.step2Description1: Here at the BP Law Law Firm, we understand that what happens during a lawsuit can be confusing to our clients.
investigation.step2Description2: We are here to make sure our clients are informed of the state of their lawsuit during each step of the process.
investigation.step2Description3: We are always here to answer all of your questions and will always be a phone call or an email away.
investigation.step2SummaryTitle: A quick summary of the lawsuit process
investigation.step2SummaryPoint1: To commence the lawsuit, we file a complaint on behalf of our clients.
investigation.step2SummarySubPoint1: In cases where the main Plaintiff in the case has unfortunately passed away, we bring a lawsuit on behalf of that individual’s family.
investigation.step2SummarySubPoint2: In cases where a new Administrator of a deceased person’s Estate needs to be appointed, our firm also works hard to take care of this.
investigation.step2SummaryPoint2: Once we file the complaint, we receive what is called an “Answer” from the Defendants (the party or parties we are suing on your behalf).
investigation.step2SummaryPoint3: As soon as we hear from the Defendant through their Answer, one of our staff members reaches out to the Court to get a court conference date scheduled to keep your case moving as fast as possible. At this conference, we set deadlines for the exchange of evidence, when depositions must be scheduled by, and when expected witnesses and experts must be identified by.
investigation.step2SummaryPoint4: Once all of this is complete, a pre-trial conference will be held. At this stage, we will discuss the possibility of settlement with the defense counsel (in this case, your matter will be resolved without going to trial).
investigation.step2SummaryPoint5: If we cannot agree on settlement with the Defendant’s attorneys, we alternatively set a trial date and proceed with taking your matter to trial.
investigation.step2SummaryPoint6: At this stage and every stage of the lawsuit, we will make sure to give your matter a high level of individual attention from our experienced team of attorneys.
investigation.resultsDescription1: While we cannot guarantee success in every case, we can guarantee that we will do everything in our power to secure a successful outcome for our clients
investigation.resultsDescription2: Here at the BP Law Law Firm, we want our clients to be treated like family – we know that our clients only reach out to us when they are experiencing an immense tragedy that they cannot endure on their own.
investigation.quote: "At our firm, we are here to provide you and your family the support you deserve, and we promise we will put up a valiant fight for your rights."

usMatters.notSureIfCaseTitle: Still not sure if your matter is a case?
usMatters.detailedExamplesIntro: Here are some more detailed examples of what types of matters can turn into a lawsuit:

exampleData.matter_content_cancer_diagnosis: You are diagnosed with Stage 4 cancer, but you later find out that this diagnosis could have been easily treated if your doctor properly identified the cancer when it was Stage 1 before it progressed.
exampleData.matter_content_cancer_complaints: You have been complaining to your doctor for over a year of abnormal medical symptoms that your doctor ignored.
exampleData.matter_content_cancer_screening: Your doctor waited until the last minute to conduct a cancer screening when it was already too late.
exampleData.matter_content_emergency_room_title: Your family member goes to the emergency room complaining of chest pain, flu-like symptoms, and dizziness.
exampleData.matter_content_emergency_room_discharge: After being examined by the emergency room doctors, despite their many complaints, the doctors discharge your family member and claim that nothing is medically wrong with them.
exampleData.matter_content_emergency_room_second_opi: A few months later, they visit another doctor for a second opinion and are told that they have a fatal illness that the emergency room doctors failed to diagnose.
exampleData.matter_content_labor_monitoring: A woman giving labor in the hospital is not being properly monitored by her doctors and nurses.
exampleData.matter_content_labor_complaints: The mother feels that her complaints are not being listened to and that she is not being properly watched.
exampleData.matter_content_labor_injury: After the birth of her baby, she learns that her baby suffers from a permanent brain injury known as hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy.
exampleData.matter_content_labor_explanation: When she inquires how this happened, she learns that this was due to fetal distress going unnoticed by her doctors. More specifically, delivery was not performed quickly enough, and as a result of the prolonged lack of fetal cord oxygen circulation, her baby will have to live with a brain injury for the rest of its life.
exampleData.matter_content_incarceration_assault: While in prison, she is sexually assaulted by a correctional officer.
exampleData.matter_content_incarceration_comments: For months, this correctional officer made inappropriate and sexual comments to her that made her feel uncomfortable and unsafe.
exampleData.matter_content_incarceration_grievances: During this period, she submitted countless grievance and complaint forms to the prison facility asking her contact with him to be limited, all of which were ignored.
exampleData.matter_content_incarceration_civil_claim: After the assault, this correctional officer is criminally charged, but this woman wants to pursue a civil claim against both this man and the facility she is located at for ignoring her multiple pleas for help.
exampleData.matter_content_car_accident_title: A woman driving her child to school is struck by a speeding police car.
exampleData.matter_content_car_accident_police_repor: The police officer in the report claims that the mother is responsible for the accident because she failed to use her turn signal, but she thinks that the police officer is also at fault.
exampleData.matter_content_car_accident_child_injury: As a result of the accident, her child is severely injured and suffers brain trauma as a result of the crash.
exampleData.matter_content_car_accident_mother_belie: The mother believes that the accident was not really her fault, and instead, the police officer was abusing his power to cover up the fact that he caused her child’s injury.
exampleData.matter_content_car_accident_investigatio: In this scenario, there is a serious injury present. Our firm would then thoroughly investigate the case and determine what caused the accident.
exampleData.matter_content_construction_title: A construction worker is working on a very dangerous jobsite that his company has assigned him to.
exampleData.matter_content_construction_openings: He notices there are many openings on the building he is assigned to work on that someone could easily fall through.
exampleData.matter_content_construction_boss_remark: Despite his remark to his boss that he thinks the site is not safe, he is instructed to continue working.
exampleData.matter_content_construction_coworker_fal: Unfortunately, one of his co-workers does end up falling through an unprotected opening on the building worksite and is badly injured.
exampleData.matter_content_construction_permanent_di: He later finds out he is permanently disabled from his fall and will be in a wheelchair for the rest of his life.
exampleData.matter_content_hostile_workplace_title: A black woman who is highly credentialed and experienced transfers departments at her company and is suddenly
exampleData.matter_content_hostile_workplace_descrip: subject to a hostile work environment of unequal treatment, unjustified criticism, and loss of position or promotional opportunity.

carLaw.pageTitle: Car Accident Attorneys in India City

notableCases.description: A passenger in a car accident was awarded a significant settlement after proving the other driver's company was negligent
Rear-end auto collision leaves 63-year-old Long Island man with herniated discs

mainContent.title: Your Trusted NYC Car Accident Attorneys Fight for Maximum Compensation

image.alt: Your Trusted Auto Accidents Attorneys in NYC

paragraphs: Dreams and plans are frequently derailed when crashes occur. Fortunately, victims of crashes can access compensation to address their losses. However, the compensation process is notoriously unfriendly to victims seeking the justice they deserve.

Because of the difficulties involved in getting proper compensation, car accident victims need a qualified NYC car accident lawyer to fight against insurance adjusters to get a compensation payout worthy of their injuries.
At the BP Law Law Firm, we work diligently to get justice for each car accident case we take on. Our team of experienced car accident lawyers serves all boroughs of India City:

locations.name: Car accident lawyer in Staten Island
Car accident lawyer in Long Island

mainContent.quote: No matter where your accident occurred in the greater India area, we have skilled attorneys ready to fight for your rights.
services: Listening to your side of the story and hearing your concerns
Thoroughly investigating every aspect of your crash
Collecting and critically analyzing evidence for your claim
Consulting with accident reconstruction and medical experts
Handling all paperwork and documents related to your claim
Meeting and negotiating with insurance company adjusters
Keeping you informed as to the progress of your claim
Filing a personal injury lawsuit if an insurance company fails to pay

mainContent.title: Where in India Do Most Car Accidents Happen?
mainContent.content: Car accidents occur throughout the five boroughs. However, Queens and Brooklyn tend to see the most crashes. That said, each borough has its hot spots where motor vehicle accidents occur at a higher rate than in other locations.
hotspots: East 14th Street and 3rd Avenue in Manhattan
Tillary Street and Jay Street in Brooklyn
Flatbush and Tillary Street in Brooklyn
Roosevelt Ave and 58th Street in Queens
Morris Avenue at East 149th Street in the Bronx
Morris Avenue at East 161st Street in the Bronx

mainContent.title: We Handle Every Type of Car Accident in India
mainContent.content: Our attorneys have represented injury victims from the Bronx to Staten Island in all kinds of accidents. Below are some of the more common types of accidents in the city.

accidentTypes.description: The forces from a head-on collision are typically much more powerful than those in other accidents. They routinely cause serious personal injuries, from traumatic brain injuries to burns from explosions and post-accident fires.

Rollover accidents put a car's occupants at serious risk of injury or death due to the roof of the car collapsing. Additionally, rollovers can result in passengers being ejected from the vehicle if a seat belt fails or is not used.
Sideswipe collisions are a direct result of careless actions, such as failure to yield. Passengers on the impact side of the vehicle face a significant risk of catastrophic injuries or death.

callToAction.title: Need Help After a Car Accident in India? Get the Compensation You Deserve!
callToAction.description: If you've been in a car accident, you deserve maximum compensation for your medical expenses, lost wages, and other losses. Contact our NYC car accident attorneys for help.

notableCases.description: Successfully represented a business owner in a dispute with a licensing board regarding permit revocation.

mainContent.title: Navigating the Complexities of Administrative Law
paragraphs: Administrative law governs the actions of government agencies.  It's a complex area that impacts businesses, individuals, and organizations in numerous ways.
Whether you're facing a licensing issue, a regulatory investigation, or a challenge to an agency's decision, it's crucial to have experienced legal counsel on your side.
Our team of administrative law attorneys is dedicated to helping clients understand their rights and navigate the administrative process effectively.
mainContent.quote: We provide strategic guidance and advocacy to clients facing a wide range of administrative law matters.
services: Representing clients in administrative hearings and appeals
Litigating administrative law cases in court

mainContent.title: Understanding Your Rights in Administrative Proceedings
mainContent.content: Administrative law provides important protections for individuals and businesses dealing with government agencies.  We can help you understand your rights and ensure that you receive due process.

mainContent.title: Our Experience in Administrative Law Matters
mainContent.content: Our attorneys have a proven track record of success in handling a variety of administrative law cases. We've represented clients before numerous agencies and courts.

caseExamples.description: Successfully defended a manufacturing company against allegations of environmental violations.
Obtained a favorable ruling for a healthcare professional facing license suspension.
Assisted a property owner in obtaining necessary zoning variances for a development project.

callToAction.title: Facing an Administrative Law Issue? Contact Us Today.
callToAction.description: Our experienced administrative law attorneys are ready to help you navigate the complexities of government regulations and protect your rights.

alternative-dispute-resolution.pageTitle: Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) Attorneys in India

notableCases.description: Facilitated a complex commercial dispute through mediation, resulting in a mutually agreeable settlement for both parties.
Represented a client in a binding arbitration proceeding, securing a favorable award for damages.

mainContent.title: Resolving Disputes Amicably: Your ADR Advocates
paragraphs: Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) offers effective alternatives to costly and time-consuming litigation.  We help clients explore various ADR options to achieve efficient and satisfactory resolutions.
Whether through mediation, arbitration, or other ADR processes, our experienced attorneys guide clients through each step, protecting their interests and working towards the best possible outcome.
We are committed to helping clients avoid the stress and expense of court battles while achieving their objectives.
mainContent.quote: We are skilled negotiators and facilitators, dedicated to helping clients find creative and effective solutions through ADR.
services: Assessing the suitability of ADR for your dispute
Representing clients in mediation and arbitration proceedings
Providing guidance on all aspects of the ADR process

mainContent.title: The Benefits of Alternative Dispute Resolution
mainContent.content: ADR offers numerous advantages over traditional litigation, including cost savings, greater control over the outcome, and the preservation of relationships.

mainContent.title: Our ADR Experience
mainContent.content: Our attorneys have extensive experience in all forms of ADR, representing clients in a wide range of disputes.  We are skilled negotiators and advocates, committed to achieving the best possible results for our clients.

caseExamples.description: Successfully mediated a complex commercial dispute between two businesses, avoiding lengthy and expensive litigation.
Represented an employee in a mediation, resulting in a favorable settlement for back wages and other damages.
Facilitated an arbitration regarding a real estate contract dispute, achieving a timely resolution for the parties involved.

callToAction.title: Considering ADR? Contact Us Today.
callToAction.description: Our experienced ADR attorneys can help you explore your options and find the best path to resolving your dispute efficiently and effectively.

notableCases.description: Successfully represented victims of a plane crash, securing a confidential settlement for their losses.
Negotiated with regulatory agencies to reduce civil penalties for an aviation client facing alleged violations.

mainContent.title: Navigating the Complex World of Aviation Law
paragraphs: Aviation law is a specialized field that encompasses a wide range of legal issues related to aircraft, airports, and air travel.  It involves federal regulations, international treaties, and complex liability issues.
Whether you're an airline, a pilot, an aircraft owner, or a passenger, you need experienced legal counsel to navigate the complexities of aviation law.
Our team of aviation law attorneys has the knowledge and expertise to handle all aspects of aviation-related legal matters.

mainContent.title: The Intersection of Law and Sports: Sports Law Specialists
paragraphs: Sports law is a dynamic and specialized field that encompasses a wide range of legal issues related to amateur and professional sports.  It involves contracts, intellectual property, labor relations, and more.

Our team of sports law attorneys advises athletes, teams, leagues, and other sports organizations on all aspects of sports law. We provide strategic and practical guidance to help our clients succeed in the competitive world of sports.
We are passionate about sports and dedicated to protecting the interests of our clients in the sports industry.
mainContent.quote: We are experienced sports law advocates, committed to helping our clients achieve their goals in the world of sports.
services: Negotiating player contracts and endorsement deals

mainContent.title: Key Aspects of Sports Law
mainContent.content: Sports law intersects with many other areas of law, including contract law, intellectual property law, labor law, and tort law. We can help you navigate these complex legal issues.

mainContent.title: Our Sports Law Experience
mainContent.content: Our attorneys have a proven track record of success in representing athletes, teams, and sports organizations. We have extensive experience in negotiating contracts, handling disciplinary matters, and protecting intellectual property rights.

caseExamples.description: Successfully negotiated a lucrative endorsement deal for a professional athlete with a major brand.
Represented an athlete in an appeal of a disciplinary sanction, resulting in a reduction of the penalty.
Advised a college athlete on a Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) agreement, ensuring compliance with NCAA regulations.

callToAction.description: Our experienced sports law attorneys are ready to provide you with expert legal guidance and representation.

Our team of technology law attorneys advises tech companies, startups, and individuals on all aspects of technology law. We provide practical and strategic guidance to help our clients navigate the complex legal landscape of the digital world.
We are committed to helping our clients innovate and succeed in the technology sector.

services: Drafting and negotiating software licenses and development agreements

image.src: [Image URL of your firm or related to taxation law]

paragraphs: Taxation law is a complex and ever-changing area that governs the assessment and collection of taxes. It impacts individuals, businesses, and organizations at all levels.

Our team of taxation law attorneys advises clients on all aspects of tax law, from tax planning and compliance to tax audits and litigation. We provide strategic and practical guidance to help our clients minimize their tax liabilities while remaining in full compliance with applicable laws.
We are dedicated to helping our clients navigate the complexities of the tax system.
mainContent.quote: We are experienced tax law professionals, committed to helping our clients minimize their tax burden and achieve their financial goals.
services: Representing clients in tax audits and appeals

mainContent.title: Handling Complex Investigations: ED/CBI Legal Representation

image.src: [Image URL of your firm or related to ED/CBI cases]

paragraphs: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) and the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) are premier investigating agencies in India, handling complex financial crimes and corruption cases.  Investigations by these agencies can be intricate and carry significant legal and reputational risks.

Our team of experienced attorneys provides specialized legal representation to individuals and businesses facing ED/CBI investigations and legal proceedings. We understand the complexities of these cases and are dedicated to protecting our clients' rights and interests.
We offer strategic guidance and aggressive advocacy at every stage of the investigation and prosecution process.

areasOfExpertise.name: Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) Cases (Corruption, Bribery)

mainContent.quote: We are committed to providing our clients with the highest quality legal representation in ED/CBI matters, protecting their rights and reputations.
services: Defending against charges of financial crimes and corruption
Advising on compliance with relevant laws and regulations

mainContent.title: Understanding ED/CBI Investigations
mainContent.content: ED and CBI investigations can be complex and involve significant legal and procedural hurdles.  We can help you understand the process and your rights.

mainContent.title: Our ED/CBI Experience
mainContent.content: Our attorneys have a proven track record of success in handling ED/CBI cases.  We have extensive experience in representing clients in a variety of high-profile investigations and prosecutions.

caseExamples.description: Successfully defended a client against allegations of money laundering, preventing the attachment of their assets.

Advised a business client on navigating a complex investigation related to alleged economic offenses.

callToAction.title: Facing an ED/CBI Investigation? Contact Us Today.

paragraphs: Political party law governs the formation, operation, and activities of political parties. It is a specialized area that intersects with election law, campaign finance law, and constitutional law.

Our team of attorneys advises political parties on all aspects of legal compliance, strategic planning, and dispute resolution.  We understand the unique legal and political challenges faced by political parties and provide tailored legal solutions.
We are committed to helping political parties navigate the complex legal landscape and achieve their political objectives.
